document_name: UNEP UNDP MoU Promoting Chemical Safety for Children at Work.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UGA/00062527/UNEP UNDP MoU Promoting Chemical Safety for Children at Work.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The Promoting Chemical Safety for Children at Work in Rural Agricultural Communities project has an overall objective to eliminate incidence of ill health arising from exposure to agricultural chemicals among children at work and agricultural communities in particular but also among all grades of workers and the general public

project_descr:
PROMOTING CHEMICAL SAFETY FOR CHILDREN AT WORK IN RURAL COMMUNITIES.
OUTPUTS- National inventory of dangerous chemicals, dangerous processes and end point discharges likely to affect working children in Agriculture
project_title: PROMOTING CHEMICAL SAFETY FOR CHILDREN AT WORK
